Effect / Reminder Text: Search your deck for two Pilots with different names, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Return up to two pilots with different names from your graveyard to your hand.
Attach this Command to a Pilot you control. Play with the top card of your deck revealed. If it's a Mecha, you may play it.
Attach this Command to a Pilot you control. All Pilots you control gain "The piloted Mecha gains +2 power".
Attach this Command to a Pilot you don't control. That Pilot loses all abilities (including alterations to cost, power and durability).
This Mecha's power is equal to your remaining bandwidth.
